name: The Cabinets of Doctor Arcana
description: The Cabinets of Doctor Arcana is a dark adventure game set inside the haunted mansion of a mysterious magician who vanished several years ago. Resolve a maze of riddles and perplexing puzzles to unlock doors and secret passages, or be doomed to spend eternity trapped inside the inescapable mansion.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Open GL Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 16 bit, 44.1 KHz, 2 Channel Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse, speakers
